author: Nicolás Salas
title: Descubre cuál es la mejor hora para cenar y comer, según la ciencia - Terra
text: Consejos Descubre cuál es la mejor hora para cenar y comer, según la cienciaEsta es la hora en la que te conviene ingerir alimentos por temas de salud. [Comer](https://www.terra.com/estilo-de-vida/2023/12/28/cuantas-veces-al-dia-debes-cepillarte-los-dientes-segun-la-ciencia-14000.html) de forma saludable y seguir de forma estricta una dieta influye de manera determinante en nuestra salud, pero no solo lo que comemos y en qué cantidad, sino cuándo lo hacemos. De acuerdo con un nuevo estudio que pone el acento en la crononutrición, que es la disciplina que ayuda a comprender la relación entre el momento de la ingesta de alimentos, los ritmos circadianos y la salud, las personas que cenan y desayunan temprano tienen menos problemas cardiovasculares. Esto se debe a que un ayuno nocturno prolongado actúa como seguro de salud, aunque no sirve saltarse el desayuno. Los resultados de este trabajo, llevados a cabo por un equipo del Instituto de Salud Global de Barcelona (ISGlobal), el INRAE, el Inserm y la Universidad de la Sorbona de París, y publicado en la revista Nature Communications, permiten realizar recomendaciones muy precisas sobre la mejor hora para realizar la primera y la última comida del día. El estudio analizó a más de 100.000 adultos del estudio NutriNet-Santé, en Francia. A todos los participantes se les pidió que informasen de forma repetida sobre los horarios de sus [alimentos](https://www.terra.com/estilo-de-vida/2023/12/28/el-ritual-de-los-granos-para-atraer-la-riqueza-abundancia-este-2024-14002.html) y su composición. Con esta información, se determinó la hora de la cena y el desayuno de cada persona y el número de comidas que realizaban al día. También se efectuó un seguimiento medio de 7 años, centrando la atención en las enfermedades cardiovasculares que desarrollaban esas personas. En última instancia, se utilizaron modelos estadísticos para relacionar los horarios de comida de los participantes con patologías vasculares cardíacas y cerebrales. En base a los resultados, Anna Palomar Cros, primera autora del estudio, recalcó la relevancia de alargar el periodo de ayuno nocturno haciendo la última comida del día más temprano, antes de las 20.00, en vez de saltarse el desayuno: “La hora a la que comemos juega un papel importante en nuestro metabolismo, ya que influye en el reloj interno de nuestro cuerpo”. Luego, Palomar dio sus recomendaciones sobre los horarios óptimos de la primera y el último alimento del día: - Desayuno: antes de las 08.00. - Cena: antes de las 20.00.

author: @UnioneSarda
title: Blindati inadeguati, non scatta il blocco con la schiuma - L'Unione Sarda.it
text:
Tre furgoni tamponati e dati alle fiamme. Sono i portavalori che, due giorni fa, hanno subito l'assalto da parte di un commando armato composto da circa 15 persone. Appartengono al tipo Fiat Ducato, tra i modelli più usati in questo settore, e il cui stemma giaceva tra l'altro sull'asfalto, lungo la statale 131, “estratto” dalla carrozzeria, forse per effetto delle decine di proiettili esplosi dagli Ak 47, i famigerati kalashnikov. Fucili che hanno perforato in particolare la portiera di uno dei blindati.
Le anomalie
«È molto difficile – sostiene Andrea Lai, vigilante di professione e appartenente al direttivo Ugl – che la lamiera possa resistere ad armi simili». La taratura del blindato è calibrata per affrontare una portata di fuoco esplosa da armi “normali” mentre quelle usate mercoledì sono da guerra. Visto il successo dell'operazione, messa in pratica con tempismo militare, e che avrebbe portato alla sottrazione di 4 milioni di euro, viene lecito chiedersi se qualche passaggio nella sicurezza sia saltato. E, in particolare, se i mezzi utilizzati siano obsoleti. «Non si può parlare di vecchia o nuova generazione –chiarisce Lai – i furgoni vengono classificati in base ai sistemi di sicurezza e secondo linee guida dettate dalla prefettura». I tre camion erano dotati del sistema spumablock, il cosiddetto “sistema passivo”, che si aziona in automatico appena il mezzo trova un ostacolo o, come è accaduto mercoledì, viene forzato da una sega circolare. In quel momento il sistema getta nel vano dove si trovano i valori una schiuma poliuretanica che si trasforma subito in una sorta di cemento, rendendo impossibile avvicinarsi ai soldi. «È una specie di “blob”, sintetizza la guardia giurata che poi chiarisce: «Non si può disattivare dall'interno». Probabilmente tutto lascia presumere che due giorni fa lo spumablock non abbia funzionato.
I dubbi
L'altro elemento che salta all'occhio è come l'autocompattatore messo di traverso sulla strada abbia interrotto la marcia di una massa da diverse tonnellate. «Mancava il rollbar che altre compagnie usano su mezzi più grossi e pesanti per sfondare l'eventuale barriera». Si tratta di una struttura tubolare in acciaio posizionata sul “muso” della vettura e che ha, appunto, l'obiettivo di spazzare via lo sbarramento e “l'effetto sorpresa”. «Che però si potrebbe evitare se, come viene proposto da tempo, ci fosse una staffetta». Una macchina cioè che precede per un km il convoglio e verifica se, lungo la direttrice percorsa, ci siano anomalie avvertendo così i colleghi. In questo caso nove: «Come da prassi, tre per ogni mezzo». Le armi a disposizione delle guardie giurate sono una pistola a testa, di solito una semiautomatica, e, in teoria, un fucile a furgone il quale dispone di apposite bocche di fuoco da cui poter sparare. «Ma non avrebbe avuto senso farlo in questo caso. Il confronto sarebbe stato impari e poi, se avesse funzionato il sistema di sicurezza, il commando non avrebbe potuto prelevare nulla». Rischaire la vita per 1300 euro, tanto è lo stipendio di un vigilante. «Si consideri anche che, una volta fermi, non si ha tempo per reagire». Sulla dinamica dell'evento si dovrebbe poter contare sulle telecamere, obbligatorie, collocate davanti e dietro i mezzi, una scatola nera che le fiamme non dovrebbero aver scalfito. «Il fuoco crea caos e cancella le tracce», conclude Lai. Non tutte, sperano gli investigatori.
RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA

In questo caso nove: «Come da prassi, tre per ogni mezzo». Le armi a disposizione delle guardie giurate sono una pistola a testa, di solito una semiautomatica, e, in teoria, un fucile a furgone il quale dispone di apposite bocche di fuoco da cui poter sparare. «Ma non avrebbe avuto senso farlo in questo caso. Il confronto sarebbe stato impari e poi, se avesse funzionato il sistema di sicurezza, il commando non avrebbe potuto prelevare nulla». Non tutte, sperano gli investigatori.

author: 李颖男
title: 济南大学社情民意研究基地成立_泉城新闻_大众网
text:
初审编辑：范明昱
责任编辑：张娜
6月12日上午，济南市政协、济南大学、市中区政协三方共建的“济南大学社情民意研究基地”在济南大学成立。市政协秘书长、党组成员李旭东，济南大学党委常委、副校长黄加栋，市中区政协主席、党组书记王书信出席成立仪式并分别致辞。
大家一致认为，加强社情民意研究是党和政府了解民情、汇聚民智、科学决策的重要渠道，也是新时代加强社会主义协商民主建设的重要内容。此次三方携手共建社情民意研究基地，是推动高校智库服务地方发展、促进政产学研深度融合的创新举措，对于加快推动人民政协事业高质量发展、打造校地合作发展新典范具有十分重要的意义。
各方一致表示，要认真履行协议规定的各项义务，立足各自优势，靠上搞好服务和协调配合。要提高政治站位，聚焦“国之大者”“民之关切”，组织引导特邀信息员和师生深入开展调查研究，努力挖掘更多“靶向精准”“供需对路”的信息，以更好服务党政决策、回应群众期盼。要树立精品意识，充分发挥人才优势、学科优势、科研优势，及时反映一些人数不多但需要引起关注的特殊群体合理诉求，反映一般渠道不易掌握的基层情况。要健全完善机制，深化协同创新，整合高校学术力量与政协实践经验，探索社情民意收集、分析和转化的新机制，切实把资源优势转化为信息优势。要培育特色品牌，打造具有济南特色、大学特质的社情民意研究高地，助力提升基层治理效能和民生服务水平，为新时代社会主义现代化强省会建设作出积极贡献。
会上三方签订了共建济南大学社情民意研究基地协议，颁发了特邀信息员聘书，特邀信息员代表作了表态发言，并对新聘的特邀信息员进行了业务培训。
济南市政协副秘书长、研究室主任张伟超、副主任常忠，济南大学政法学院院长、相关处室负责同志，区政协副主席闫勇、区政协秘书长、办公室主要负责同志参加活动。
初审编辑：范明昱
责任编辑：张娜
6月13日和15日，李宗盛“有歌之年”巡回演唱会济南站，将在济南奥林匹克体育中心体育馆开启。为满足广大市民、歌迷的公交出行需求，济南公交将开通地铁接驳摆渡线及9条歌迷定制专线，为歌迷出行保驾护航。[[详细]](https://jinan.dzwww.com/qcxw/202506/t20250612_16060389.htm)
6月5日下午，作为2025济南高新区纪念辛弃疾诞辰885周年“稼轩百戏节”暨开心麻花文化惠民演出季的重要组成部分，“春华杯”山东青年戏剧大赛复赛暨作品展演在济南高新区开心麻花剧场拉开帷幕。来自全省各高校的戏剧爱好者汇聚一堂，用戏剧表达青春思考，以舞台展现创意[[详细]](https://jinan.dzwww.com/qcxw/202506/t20250609_16041687.htm)
济南市2025年初中学业水平考试将于6月13日-15日进行。根据考试安排，今天（6月12日）下午考生可以到考点熟悉情况。据悉，今年中考济南市报名共20余万人，其中毕业年级（九年级）8.8万余人，设14个考区，72个考点，2900余个考场；非毕业年级11.5万余人，全市共设14个考[[详细]](https://jinan.dzwww.com/qcxw/202506/t20250612_16068885.htm)
6月10日，山东艺术学院与青岛啤酒文化传播有限公司在青岛啤酒时光海岸举行产学研战略合作协议签约仪式。山东艺术学院党委委员、副院长荆雷，青岛啤酒文化传播有限公司副总经理、青岛啤酒国际旅游发展有限公司总经理曾超出席并讲话。[[详细]](https://jinan.dzwww.com/qcxw/202506/t20250612_16068609.htm)

author: Le10Sport.com
title: Mercato - FC Nantes : Viré, il part au clash ! - Le10sport.com
text: Remercié en novembre dernier et remplacé depuis par Jocelyn Gourvennec, Pierre Aristouy en a, définitivement, terminé avec le FC Nantes. Le technicien aurait proposé d'intégrer le staff de son successeur, mais cette proposition aurait été repoussée par la direction. Faute d'accord entre les deux parties, l'affaire pourrait se terminer aux prud’hommes. Le 29 novembre dernier, le FC Nantes publiait un communiqué pour annoncer le départ de Pierre Aristouy. A la tête de l'équipe première depuis mai dernier, le technicien a été remplacé par [ Jocelyn Gourvennec](/football/mercato/mercato-psg-il-recale-paris-pour-signer-au-fc-nantes-677185) sur le banc. Marqué, il aurait profité de quelques jours de repos avant de négocier son départ avec sa direction. Mercato - FC Nantes : Après la révolution, il annonce un fiasco https://t.co/pdJvMYRznt pic.twitter.com/k1J05sfG1w— le10sport (@le10sport) [December 28, 2023] Aristouy se fait recaler par le FC Nantes Ancien entraîneur des U19, Pierre Aristouy aurait proposé ses services au FC Nantes, même après son départ. Selon les informations de Presse-Océan, le technicien était enclin à intégrer le staff de Jocelyn Gourvennec. Mais la direction du club n'a pas souhaité donner suite à sa demande. Un conflit éclate Comme indiqué par le média, Aristouy ne restera pas au FC Nantes dans d'autres fonctions. Aucun accord n'a été trouvé entre les deux parties et l'affaire pourrait bien se terminer aux prud'hommes. Contacté, Aristouy n'a pas souhaité commenter sa situation.

author: United Food
title: Workers at Cannabis Software Firm Dutchie File for Landmark Union Election | PressReleasePoint
text:
United Food and...on Thu, 08/07/2025 - 21:21
BOSTON – Today, Product Support Agents and Product Support Analysts from cannabis software company, Dutchie, filed to form a union with United Food and Commercial Workers (UFCW) Local 1445.
August 7, 2025
Election marks the first time that cannabis software company workers have filed to form a union
BOSTON – Today, Product Support Agents and Product Support Analysts from cannabis software company, Dutchie, filed to form a union with United Food and Commercial Workers (UFCW) Local 1445. Dutchie, a cannabis software tech company founded in 2017, provides business software to more than 6,500 dispensaries across the country and is responsible for 1 million transactions daily.
As Product Support Agents and Product Support Analysts, these workers assist consumers and cannabis businesses with technical support and represent Dutchie for thousands of clients. Their labor makes it possible for the platforms that cannabis employers use to be efficient, accessible, and successful in providing safe and compliant cannabis to the public.
Thelonius (Theo) Spence, a tier 2 product support analyst and organizing committee member, said the following:
“In the five years that I’ve worked in Dutchie Support, I’ve survived round after round of layoffs and seen countless talented and hard-working people lose their jobs or burn out and leave. We shouldn’t have to leave to find greener pastures. We want job security and clear expectations at the company we helped build.
“Compensation among our team is wildly inconsistent with our tenure and performance, and raises haven’t kept up with the cost of living. The implementation of an outsourced overseas team, AI tools, and metrics-based micromanagement make us feel like our days are numbered.
“Especially in this political climate, the time for us to band together is now– both to push back against the constant changes that we are subjected to at work, and to contribute to building a larger movement of solidarity among working people.”
Michael Guarino, a tier 2 product support analyst and organizing committee member, said the following:
“My passion for technology and the benefits that cannabis can provide are what brought me to Dutchie. Our industry is all about promoting a healthier well-being, and it is time that we ensure that value is being upheld and preserved at Dutchie. I shouldn’t have to sacrifice maintaining my work-life balance or mental health in exchange for being a high-performing worker.
“I hope through this process we can improve our working conditions, ensure fair pay among our team, secure our jobs for the future, and improve time off policies, which will ensure we can recharge so we can support our customers to the very best of our abilities.”
As America’s largest cannabis union, the UFCW has spent over a decade in this emerging industry, advocating for workers and fighting to establish critical labor protections to ensure that, as the industry grows, cannabis industry jobs are safe, equitable, and family-sustaining. For more information about the UFCW’s work across the cannabis industry, visit ufcw.org/cannabis .
###
UFCW Local 1445 is part of the UFCW International, the largest private sector union in the United States, representing 1.2 million workers and their families in cannabis, grocery, meatpacking, food processing, health care, retail and other essential industries in all 50 states, Canada, and Puerto Rico. The UFCW is committed to organizing and supporting cannabis workers across the industry, from seed to sale. Learn more about the UFCW at ufcw.org .
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->corporate news and profiles

author: Compiled by DIVYA THERESA, C. ARUNO and R. ARAVINTHAN
title: Donate blood, get a free bag of rice | The Star
text:
Compiled by DIVYA THERESA, C. ARUNO and R. ARAVINTHAN
A 5KG bag of rice is being offered to individuals who donate blood as part of a month-long blood donation drive in Alor Setar.
Organised by the Kedah Council of Justices of Peace, its deputy president Datuk Tan Hong Eng said the incentive is aimed at encouraging the public to become blood donors and contribute to the state’s blood supply.
The programme is being held in collaboration with Sultan Abdul Halim Hospital, with a target of collecting 3,000 blood bags, according to Sinar Harian.
“This programme started on Nov 1 and will run until Nov 30. Every donor who contributes blood will receive a 5kg bag of rice as a token of appreciation,” Tan said.
He emphasised the importance of addressing critical blood shortages, especially as Kedah and Perlis require up to 5,000 bags of blood each month.
“Hence, we are taking this initiative to encourage donors from all walks of life and suitable age groups to donate,” he said.
> A 67-year-old grandmother, Fatimah Mohd Ali, recently surprised fellow hikers when she reached the summit of Bukit Maras, 329m above sea level, with only a pair of slippers and a walking stick for support, Utusan Malaysia reported.
The mother of seven and grandmother of 20, from Kampung Kebor Besar in Kuala Terengganu, had been experiencing knee pain and body aches, prompting her children to suggest hiking as a way to stay active.
“I started the hike at 6.30am with my three children and six grandchildren, and we reached the peak about 30 minutes later.
“I never expected I’d be able to climb without any problems, which surprised other hikers when they saw a senior citizen making it to the top.
“Some of them took pictures, and it went viral on social media recently,” said Fatimah, adding that she would like to climb many more hills in Terengganu.
> A recent social media post about loneliness by actress Nadia Brian has raised questions, Kosmo! reported.
However, Nadia denied being lonely, explaining it was simply a reflection of the boredom women sometimes experience.
Nadia, whose real name is Nadia Najwa Mohamed Rashid, 32, explained that the post was made during her menstrual cycle when her hormones were unstable, and that it was not an indication of any personal issues.
Nadia married Muizz Nasruddin in November 2019, but the couple divorced in April 2021.
The above articles are compiled from the vernacular newspapers (Bahasa Malaysia, Chinese and Tamil dailies). As such, stories are grouped according to the respective language/medium. Where a paragraph begins with a, it denotes a separate news item.

author: @nzherald
title: UFC Abu Dhabi: Robert Whittaker welcomes Reinier de Ridder bout as he eyes one more title run
text:
Robert Whittaker isn’t shy of the fact his mixed martial arts career has more yesterdays than it does tomorrows at this point.
Since 2009, he has been competing in the sport professionally and since 2012, he has been plying his trade at the highest level with the UFC.
